description: Visual query classifier eval â€” REALISTIC. Natural, conversational queries the way people actually talk to smart glasses. Rambling, filler words, run-on sentences, context mixed in.

cases.query: hey so I was walking past this store and I saw something in the window can you tell me what that is
ok so I'm at the grocery store right now and I'm looking at this thing but I have no idea what it is
hey I was thinking about getting this for my girlfriend do you think it looks nice
so there's this weird bug on the wall can you tell me if it's dangerous
I'm trying to read this menu but the text is really small can you help me out
wait hold on what kind of tree is that I've been seeing them everywhere lately
my friend told me about this place and I'm standing right in front of it what can you tell me about it
so I found this old coin in my drawer and I have no idea what it is can you identify it
I'm at the pharmacy and I'm looking at two different brands of the same thing which one should I get
there's a sign over there but I can't quite make out what it says
hey can you check if this shirt and these pants actually go together I'm not sure
so I'm at a restaurant and looking at the specials board what are they offering
I just picked up this bottle of wine and I want to know if it's any good
yo there's this car parked outside that looks really cool what model is it
I'm looking at this painting in the gallery and I'm curious who made it and what it's about
can you read the ingredients on this for me I forgot my reading glasses
so there's this building I walk past every day and I've always wondered what style of architecture it is
I'm in the electronics section and I'm trying to figure out the difference between these two laptops
hey so there's this rash on my arm that showed up yesterday does it look like anything serious
I'm at a crosswalk and I'm not sure if the light is green or if it's just the sun reflecting
what's that thing on the ceiling over there it looks kind of weird
so I got this package delivered and the label is in another language can you translate it
there's a dog in the park and I want to know what breed it is my kids keep asking me
I'm looking at the departure board at the airport and I can't find my flight
hey what kind of flower is this growing in my yard I don't remember planting it
so I was thinking about what to have for dinner tonight maybe something with chicken what do you think
hey can you remind me what time my dentist appointment is tomorrow I think it was in the afternoon
I've been feeling kind of tired lately do you think I should be sleeping more or is it something else
so my friend was telling me about this new show on Netflix and I was wondering if it's actually good
hey what's the weather going to be like this weekend I'm thinking about going hiking
I need to figure out how to get to the airport from here what's the fastest route
can you explain the difference between a 401k and an IRA I've been meaning to look into that
so I heard there was some big news today about the stock market what happened
hey what's a good recipe for banana bread my mom used to make it but I never got her recipe
I was just wondering how far away is the moon like in miles or whatever
can you set a timer for like twenty minutes I've got something in the oven
hey so my coworker was talking about machine learning the other day and I didn't really understand what it is can you explain it simply
I need to send a birthday message to my sister but I don't know what to write can you help me come up with something
what's the best way to get red wine out of a white shirt I just spilled some at dinner
so I've been learning Spanish and I was wondering how do you conjugate irregular verbs
hey do you know if there's a good Italian place around here I'm craving some pasta
I'm trying to figure out if I should buy or lease my next car what are the pros and cons
my phone battery has been dying really fast lately do you know why that might be happening
hey what's the name of that actor who was in that movie you know the one with the heist and the vault
so I've been having this argument with my friend about whether a hot dog is a sandwich what do you think
can you tell me about the history of this neighborhood I've always been curious about how it got its name
I was reading this article about intermittent fasting and I'm wondering if it's actually backed by science
hey so my landlord just raised the rent and I'm wondering what my rights are in this situation
what's a good book to read if I like science fiction but something that's not too heavy
I keep forgetting is it feed a cold and starve a fever or the other way around
